        public FixedWidthWriter(File file,
                        boolean append)
        Parameters:
        file -
        append - Indicates if writing should start at the end of the file (if it exists). If the specified file exists and has contents (more than 0 bytes), then the fieldNamesInFirstRow property will be set to false.
